entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Build Analysis" report is missing a build break in a test #84049
    8.0.0
  • Add tests for downgrading assembly resolution via resolution extensions #84039
    8.0.0
  • VersionConverter throws NullReferenceException if Version is null #84037
  • Cannot enumerate VS workloads on ARM64 (exception in `dotnet --info`) #84033
  • Determine behavior for GeneratedComClass on a type with no GeneratedComInterface interfaces #84032
  • Process memory and the memory snapshot are not equal #84035
    Future
  • Consider expanding casts in late phases #84025
    Future
  • Test and verify OpenSSL 3.1 support #84021
  • Support top-level populate methods for JSON (patch) #84018
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CreateAddAndClear<Int32> #84029
    8.0.0
  • Size saving opportunity for System.Text.Json generators with custom converters #84015
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM CultureInfo names returns locale #84016
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeInitialization\\CctorsWithSideEffects\\CctorForWrite\\CctorForWrite.cmd #84007
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/regressions/2164/foreground-shutdown/foreground-shutdown.cmd #84006

Closed

  • [jitosr_stress_random] Failures in System.Text related tests #83959
    8.0.0
  • [pgostress] fullpgo_random_gdv_edge failures in JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65988/GitHub_65988/GitHub_65988 #83960
    8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Networking and Security tests fail on spanish servers: There are no more endpoints available in the endpoint mapper #83226
    7.0.x
  • [bug] dotnet warns CA1416 even though TargetFramework is Windows #76824
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 29 Regressions on 12/2/2022 1:56:04 AM #79336
  • [API Proposal]: Add "poll" object #83989
  • Test failure System.Tests.StringTests.IndexOf_SingleLetter on osx-x64 Debug #84010
    8.0.0
  • Consider shipping Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility with every servicing release #77557
  • Make .NET Framework and .NET Standard facade changes trackable #65997
    8.0.0
  • [cecil] TFM trimming, and elimination of net4* targeting in Linux source-build #83991
  • Arm64 tests are not run as part of CI #83947
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #71070
    8.0.0
  • [perf] RSA is significantly slower than RSACryptoServiceProvider when verifying data #83994
  • CI failure STRICT_JS doesn't work with MODULARIZE or EXPORT_ES6 #83986
  • Question/issue about GT_COMMA on rhs of GT_ASG. #1699
    Future
  • [wasm] crash instead of nullref caused by null check elimination #83941
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: File.ReadLines增加支持读写的打开方式，很多时候在打开的同时还有应用在写入，避免占用报错 #82152
  • JsonConverter<decimal> rounds number, even after overriding Write(...) method in custom converter #81825

PullRequests

Created

  • offers to start and stop IHostedService concurrently #84048
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Coalesce identical constant WordCategories #84047
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84036
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Use timeouts in 2 socket test cases #84030
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Reverting: Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility (#80581) #84028
    area-System.Reflection
  • [Mono] Use dn_vector_t instead of GArray in a few places #84027
    area-Build-mono
  • Streamline a few members of char #84024
    area-System.Runtime
  • Revert #80698 and obsolete JsonSerializerOptions.AddContext #84022
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Fix AREA alignment warning on Windows ARM64 #84020
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` change case #84019
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Enabled Sqrt and Abs intrinsics #84011
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Mono] Intrinsify multiply and divide for mini JIT on ARM64 #84004
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Merged

  • Add lowering for As*() and dependent methods. #83861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • JIT: small OSR locals must be normalize on load #84000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix precondition if HOST_UNIX in ClrVirtualAllocWithinRange() #84023
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Restore original stack ref enumeration behavior #84034
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [6.0] Avoid using spanish helix queues #83748
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Avoid using spanish helix queues #83747
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [6.0] Create action to check service label #84045
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix service label action #84046
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use bit mask in Regex's IsWordChar #84003
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update check-service-labels.yml #84044
    needs-area-label
  • Fix piping in yml #84042
    needs-area-label
  • [release/7.0-staging] Create action to check servicing label #84041
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Create action to check servicing label #84038
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Provide support for exposing .NET classes to COM through source generation #83755
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Libraries area pod updates for March 2023, plus some fabricbot maintenance #83897
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • [6.0] Update backport template and servicing docs #84008
    area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure that CONTEXT_XStateFeaturesMask is explicitly zeroed out on RtlCaptureContext #84012
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Reimplement DacStackReferenceWalker and DacHandleWalker #83836
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Initial changes for globalization hybrid mode #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [7.0] Update backport template and servicing docs #84005
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update backport template and servicing docs #83795
    area-Infrastructure
  • Delete Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility from runtime #84013
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Check in shim typeforwards and remove the dependency on the underlying targeting packs #79147
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Renable running Arm64 test cases in CI #83948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use docker images with emscripten 3.1.30 #84014
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [workload] Fix using empty RuntimeIdentifier in LibraryBuilder AutoImport.props #83834
  • Fix infinite timeout passed to CancellationTokenSource.CancelAfter #84009
    area-System.Threading
  • Enable regex source gen / compiler vectorization of all sets #83992
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Allow forward substituting small-typed nodes #83969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Generalize handling of commas in block morphing #83590
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workloads] Mark the windows runtime packs workload as abstract #83230
    area-Build-mono
  • Add osx-arm64 for coreclr packages. #84001
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Extend mstat format with information that maps to dependency nodes #83578
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fix the removal of relations added by basic blocks. #83943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Use Span.CopyTo(Span) in BigInteger's add and subtract #83951
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListeners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Improve servicing docs for Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #83557
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • OSDescription.Linux: return a user-friendly name based on /etc/os-release. #83976
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • JIT: Prototype a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch mono to use cmake-detected objcopy #83903
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83728
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Disable more unsupported runtime tests #83731
    Servicing-approved
  • Unroll SequenceEqual(ref byte, ref byte, nuint) in JIT #83945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83729
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83743
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Reverting: Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility (#81101) #83565
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 7.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux (#67589) #83965
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 6.0.17
  • [release/6.0] SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83742
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 6.0.17
  • [runtime/6.0] [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #83079
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux (#67589) #83966
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Fix reserving executable memory as per allocation type in ClrVirtualAllocWithinRange() #83958
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] ManagedToNativeGenerator: Skip unmanaged dlls #83957
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] [MONO][MARSHAL] Initialize ilgen with a flag #83813
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] disable NTLM tests on RedHat.7 #83602
    area-System.Net, test-bug, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing #83577
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • [WIP] RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] Ensure free buffer space when reading TLS messages #83574
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] JIT: fix bug in cloning conditions for jagged array (#83414) #83462
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83303
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Default media type used when 'null' is passed to StringContent #81506 #83425
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, regression-from-last-release, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0][mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83302
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0] Fix special sweep issue for workstation #83342
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Fixing a bug that causes us to mistakenly demote a gen2 region to gen0 #83341
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • [runtime/7.0] [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #83078
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix max chunk size limiting #81607
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • WASM Toolchain Support for ARM64 #80955
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] createdump: only dump committed memory #79983
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Set minimum language version allowed by config binding generator #83996
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [NO MERGE][wasm-threads] JSImport promises on background threads #83838
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • ConvertIcuTimeFormatString: convert narrow no-break spaces to spaces too. #83589
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Take advantage of simplifications enabled by folding all indirect access to locals #79722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.34 #83998
    area-Build-mono
  • Add ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIf{Not}Equal #83853
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add Utf8.TryWrite #83852
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Optimization on LinearScan::buildPhysRegRecords #83862
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Re-order some blocks in runtimelookup #83453
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix BeginReceiveMessageFromV4BoundToSpecificV6_NotReceived #83463
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Implement the STJ.UseReflectionDefault feature switch #83844
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Mono support for InlineArrayAttribute #83776
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Proper type name parser for native AOT compiler #83657
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods on WASM. #82981
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [wasm] Drop extra files from ReferenceCopyLocalPaths #83670
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Read StartDiskNumber as uint32 #83923
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Use similar types for self-referential generics instead of the exact canonical type #83995
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
